pullRequest.body: This isn't everything with >1year deprecation ages: unfortunately lots is still actually in use!

nodes.body:
### PR summary [75489aea79](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15958/commits/75489aea7986cc75f084197e502820e0381b748b)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`- ContinuousOn.exists_forall_ge'`
`- ContinuousOn.exists_forall_le'`
`- Equiv.decidableMeas`
`- IsCompact.exists_forall_ge`
`- IsCompact.exists_forall_le`
`- IsCompact.exists_isLocalMinOn_mem_subset`
`- eq_of_partialEquiv_eq`
`- gauge_ball'`
`- monotone_iff_ofFn_sorted`
`- not_even_bit1`
`- two_smul'`
`- unop_map_list_prod`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
It'd be nice to have a list of the old deprecated theorems in current use, so people can get to cleaning them up.

> It'd be nice to have a list of the old deprecated theorems in current use, so people can get to cleaning them up.

The answer here is basically: "any lemma with `nthLe` in the name".

> @Parcly-Taxel, thanks for taking a look here. It would actually make more sense if you made that commit into a separate PR:
> 
>     1. I could then immediately merge it, instead of us needing to go find another reviewer
> 
>     2. It will keep this PR simpler, as it is just deleting things, not making significant changes.

#15965

Thanks!
maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by grunweg.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10468306717/job/28988901565)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10468306717/job/28988900865)

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

Thanks :tada:

bors merge
I would prefer that we explicitly turn off the linter and comment about how it is failing at `h` than work around the issues.
@Parcly-Taxel pushed these changes to my PR ... :-(
I've deleted Jeremy's commit from this PR, so this comment now belongs on https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15965.
(And I've implemented the suggestion there.)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: remove >1 year deprecations
